title: Wongawallan: Two-year-old critical after being hit in Gold Coast driveway
text:
A young boy is in a critical condition after being run over by a reversing car in a Gold Coast driveway.

The two-year-old was struck and dragged five metres along the driveway after 6am today, suffering significant injuries to his face, shoulder, pelvis and leg. The accident occurred in Elevation Drive, in Wongawallan, a rural area in the Gold Coast, Queensland.

He was taken to the Gold Coast University Hospital in a critical but stable condition, with fractures to one of his legs and his collarbone.

#UPDATE - one pateint with leg, shoulder and facial injuries has been transported to Gold Coast Univeristy Hospital lights and sirens with HARU and CCP on board. — Queensland Ambulance (@QldAmbulance) October 30, 2019

A police spokesperson said the boy was conscious and breathing as he was treated at the scene, according to The Gold Coast Bulletin.
description: A young boy is in a critical condition after being run over by a reversing car in a Gold Coast driveway.
